name: CPInformationRatingItem
desc: A data object that provides rated content for an information template.

items.name: init(rating: NSNumber?, maximumRating: NSNumber?, title: String?, detail: String?)
items.desc: Creates a rating item with a current and a maximum rating.

items.name: var rating: NSNumber?
items.desc: The current rating that the template displays.

items.name: var maximumRating: NSNumber?
items.desc: The maximum rating that the template displays.
